body.content:
Esteemed,

We hope you are well and safe? I am contacting you at this time by
email on the instructions of my principal in a matter that has already
been explained through a letter to you. The letter was first sent to
your address immediately after his 93th birthday, but we believe it
was probably mailed to an old or incorrect address since we didn't get
any correspondence from you back then! Being a very crucial and
sensitive matter, this email is unsecured to divulge such important
information. But we will be more than willing to resend the letter by
post when you provide a more current address.

Most definitely, I know this will come to you as a huge surprise!
However, I also want you to know that surprises are everywhere in
life. And they usually come from misjudging people and situations for
being less than they appear! To sum up this matter, we have a mandate
to bring to your notice information that will bring you great joy and
relief! And as it is often said, cold water to a soul is good news
from a far away country! This best explains this situation we have on
hand! But as I have also said, the details cannot be divulged in a
public space.
As soon as I receive your immediate response, the circumstances of the
decision will be
explained to you in detail, especially after confirming your
fulfillment of the criteria
specified in the document! So, kindly respond back to me in order to
bring you the details.
Lastly, I would like to warn that it will be a very huge mistake or
outright negligence of you
not to respond to this message because of its very importance!
I am looking forward to hearing from you soon via enquiries@finadvisoryhk.com.

Best wishes,
Kathie Lou.
